description: vertical ōban triptych;bind in a book with 96.146.106*
inscription: Name of each character on the picture written aside the figures, right: {Hantoki Kyu_robe_[?]} | {Honcho_maru Tsunagoro_} (man beating a policeman) | {Musume} (a giral) [Koito, Itoya ?? Sashichi] | {Honcho_maru koko_ wo nigare hitotabi O_saka no no [???] goto_chi on nagori} (Hancho_maru fled police and came to O_sake....)

signed: Right, left: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga} | center:  一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga}
title: (Three Men Fighing and Two other Watching the Fight from an Unidentified Kabuki Play)
